Parameters: The identifier for the remote endpoint that sent the response.

The status of the response. Valid values are @B_com#google#android#gms#nearby#connection#ConnectionsStatusCodes#STATUS_OK_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#nearby#connection#ConnectionsStatusCodes#STATUS_CONNECTION_REJECTED_E@, and @B_com#google#android#gms#nearby#connection#ConnectionsStatusCodes#STATUS_NOT_CONNECTED_TO_ENDPOINT_E@.

Bytes of a custom message provided in the connection response (on success). This array will not exceed @B_com#google#android#gms#nearby#connection#Connections#MAX_RELIABLE_MESSAGE_LEN_E@ bytes in length.
onConnectionResponse(java.lang.String, c.Description: Called when a response is received for a connection request.
onConnectionResponse(java.lang.String, c.FullName: public abstract void onConnectionResponse (String remoteEndpointId, Status status, byte[] payload)

ClassDesc: Callback for responses to connection requests.
